text: Thomas Litscher (born 14 May 1989) is a Swiss cross-country mountain biker. ==Major results== ;2007 : UCI World Championships ::1st 20px Team relay ::1st 20px Junior cross-country : European Championships ::1st 15px Junior cross- country ::1st 15px Team relay ;2009 : European Championships ::2nd 15px Under-23 cross-country ::2nd 15px Team relay ;2010 : UCI World Championships ::1st 20px Team relay ::2nd 15px Under-23 cross-country : 1st 15px Team relay, European Championships ;2011 : UCI World Championships ::1st 20px Under-23 cross-country ::2nd 15px Team relay : European Championships ::2nd 15px Team relay ::3rd 15px Under-23 cross-country ;2012 : 1st 20px Cross-country eliminator, National Championships : 3rd 15px Cross-country, UCI Under-23 World Championships ;2013 : 2nd Cross-country eliminator, National Championships ;2014 : 3rd Cross-country eliminator, National Championships ;2017 : 3rd 15px Cross-country, UCI World Championships ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Swiss mountain bikers
title: Thomas Litscher
